title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - G1000 NXi - tracking flighttime
description:
In this video we will look at a feature from the G1000 NXi which allows you to easily track your flighttime. This is very useful both when you want to know for how long your are flying but also during bush trips where you don't want to use the build timer functionality in the separate window.
